name: Friedrich
description: Friedrich is a space cat. He is very good at catching mice and loves to play with yarn.

name: Helga
description: Helga loves to joke around with her friends and is always up for a good time. She is a very good listener and loves to help others.

name: Johann
description: Johann is a very curious cat. He loves to explore new places and meet new people. He is always up for an adventure.
